en: <V>{player} <R>rolled a double 3 times and went to jail.
tr: <V>{player} <R>üç defa çift zar attığı için hapise düştü.
ar: <V>{player} <R>لعب نرد مزدوج ثلاث مرات وذهب الى السجن!

en: <V>{player} <J>rolled a <CH>{dice1} <J>and <CH>{dice2} <J>and failed to escape from jail!
ar: <V>{player} <J>rolled a <CH>{dice1} <J>and <CH>{dice2} <J>and failed to escape from jail!

en: <V>{player} <J>paid the <VP>$50 <J>fine to get out of jail.
ar: <V>{player} <J>paid the <VP>$50 <J>fine to get out of jail.

en: <V>{player} <J>rolled doubles to get out of jail.
<V>{player} <J>used a "Get Out of Jail Free" card.
<ROSE>Roll the dice to determine start order.
<V>{player} <J>has to pay <VP>$200 <J>in income tax from collecting too much cheese!
tr: <V>{player} <J>çok fazla peynir topladığı için <VP>$200 <J>gelir vergisi ödemek zorunda kaldı.
ar: <V>{player} <J>has to pay <VP>$200 <J>in income tax from collecting too much cheese!

en: <V>{player} <J>has to pay <VP>$100 <J>in luxury tax for being too noob!
tr: <V>{player} <J>fazla noob olduğu için <VP>$100 <J>özel tüketim vergisi ödemek zorunda kaldı.
ar: <V>{player} <J>has to pay <VP>$100 <J>in luxury tax for being too noob!

en: <V>{player} <R>went bankrupt and has lost the game! All of their assets will be turned over to <V>{playerowner}.
tr: <V>{player} <R>iflas etti ve oyunu kaybetti! Tüm malvarlığı <V>{playerowner} <R> oyuncusuna devredilecek.
ar: <V>{player} <R>went bankrupt and has lost the game! All of their assets will be turned over to <V>{playerowner}.

en: <V>{player} <J>landed on <font color="#{propertycolor}">{movedtoproperty} <J>owned by <V>{playerowner}<J>. Property is mortgaged, no rent was collected.
tr: <V>{player}<J>, sahibi <V>{playerowner} <J>olan <font color="#{propertycolor}">{movedtoproperty} <J>mülkünün üzerinde. Mülk ipotek edildiği için, kira ödenmedi.
ar: <V>{player} <J>landed on <font color="#{propertycolor}">{movedtoproperty} <J>owned by <V>{playerowner}<J>. Property is mortgaged, no rent was collected.

en: <J>Before you can buy a house, you must own all the properties of a color-group.
tr: <J>Ev satın almadan önce bir renk grubundaki tüm mülkiyetlere sahip olmalısınız.
ar: <J> قبل أن تتمكن من شراء منزل ، يجب أن تمتلك جميع مجموعة اللون.

en: <J>You don't have any house to sell.
<J>You don't have any house to mortgage.
<J>You don't have any house to unmortgage.
ar: <J>ليس لديك أي منزل لفك الرهن العقاري عنه.

en: <J>At least one property in your offer has a house/hotel. You need to either remove the property or offer all properties in its color-group.
tr: <J>Teklifinde en az bir mülkte ev/otel bulunmakta. Mülkü kaldır veya renk grubundaki tüm mülkleri teklife dahil et.
<font color="#000000">En Yüksek Teklif: <VP>${bid}\n<font color="#000000">En Yüksek Teklifi Veren: <V>{bidder}
Bankada senin yararına bir hata oldu\n$200 kazandın

en: From sale of stock you get $50

tr: Hayat sigortası primlerin geri ödendi\n$100 al
ar: استحقاق التأمين على الحياة احصل على 100$

en: You have won second prize in a beauty contest.\nCollect $10
tr: Güzellik yarışmasında ikincilik ödülü kazandın\n$10 al
ar: لقد فزت بالجائزة الثانية في مسابقة جمال احصل على 10$

en: It is your birthday.\nCollect $10 from every player
ar: إنه عيد ميلادك احصل على 10$ من كل لاعب

en: Get out of jail free\nThis card may kept until needed
tr: Hapisten kefaret ödemeden çık\nBu kartı lazım olana dek saklayabilirsin
ar: اخرج من السجن مجانًا قد يتم الاحتفاظ بهذه البطاقة لحين الحاجة إليها

en: Advance to Transformice Alley\nIf you pass GO collect $200
ar: تقدم إلى Transformice Alley إذا نجحت في اجتياز البداية أحصل على 200$

en: Take a trip to Trade Station\nIf you pass GO collect $200
ar: قم برحلة إلى المحطة التجارية إذا نجحت في اجتياز البداية  أحصل على 200$

en: Advance to Towerdefence Street\nIf you pass GO collect $200
ar: تقدم إلى Towerdefence Street إذا مررت البداية أحصل على 200$

en: Make general repairs on all of your houses\nFor each house pay $25\nFor each hotel pay $100
tr: Binalarının genel tadilatını yap\nHer ev için $25 öde\nHer otel için $100 öde
ar: قم بإجراء إصلاحات عامة على جميع منازلك مقابل كل منزل ادفع 25$ مقابل كل فندق ادفع 100$

en: You are assessed for street repairs\nFor each house pay $40\nFor each hotel pay $115
tr: Sokağın tadilatı sana düştü\nHer ev için $40 öde\nHer otel için $115 öde
ar: يجب عليك اصلاح الشوارع مقابل كل منزل ادفع 40$ مقابل كل فندق ادفع 115$

en: You have won a crossword competition\nCollect $100
ar: لقد فزت في مسابقة الكلمات المتقاطعة\n احصل على 100$

tr: İnşaat kredinin primleri geri ödendi\n$150 al
ar: موعد استحقاق قرض البناء الخاص بك\n احصل على 150$

en: Get out of jail free\nThis card may kept until needed
tr: Hapisten kefaret ödemeden çık\nBu kartı lazım olana dek saklayabilirsin
ar: اخرج من السجن مجانًا\n يتم الاحتفاظ بهذه البطاقة لحين الحاجة إليها
